Title: Cottonmouth
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Boyd reluctantly joins a payroll heist, but can he trust his new partners? Meanwhile, Raylan's investigation into a forged signature on a dead man's government check leads back to the Bennett clan.
